_source.text: A better than expected weather has been predicted for the capital's festivities, with forecasters saying there is a chance the city could escape downpours like those which drenched Edinburgh yesterday.

_source.text: According to Chevrolet the front-wheel drive four-cylinder model will accelerate to 60 mph in 8.7 seconds and can achieve 22 mpg city and 32 mpg highway - that's better than Ford's Escape Hybrid's highway fuel economy.
